entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts.

entities.name: horace slughorn
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts who has a tendency to be vain and likes the company of famous people.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Harry and his friends are students.

entities.name: muggle-born
entities.description: A term used to describe people who were born to non-magical parents but have magical abilities themselves.

relationships.description: Harry is not sure whether he likes Slughorn or not.
Dumbledore knows Horace Slughorn's personality and tendencies.
Harry is a student at Hogwarts.
Horace Slughorn teaches potions at Hogwarts.
